channel.title: Projects on Venkatachalam
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Venkatachalam

item.title: Projects
item.description: 1. Remote interference management Graph based ML solution to observe and detect remote interference in 5G networks. 2. Network Milestone completion time estimation Model trees to predict the time to complete different milestones of network rollout project. 3. Traffic classification in Packet core Identify the mobile application and classifying the type of user actions (send/receive message, file transfer, voice or video calls) based on first few encrypted packets of TCP or UDP flow.
